Executive MBA in Innovation & Business Creation

Technical University of Munich (TUM) is one of Europe's top universities.UnternehmerTUM, the Center for Innovation and Business Creation at TUM, provides trainingfor entrepreneurially talented individuals, identifies promising technologies and ideas and initiates innovation projects and business startups. TUM has contributed to more than 700 startups that employ approximately 14,500 people.The Executive MBA combines the strengths of the German „University of Excellence“ – Technische Universität München (TUM) with the entrepreneurial know-how of UnternehmerTUM, the Center for Innovation and Business Creation at TUM. Professors from TUM School of Management, UC Berkeley, Imperial College London and other international renowned universities, as well as high-profile figures from the world of business and business consultancy pass on their knowledge and project experience to course participants.
